lines: We are peaceful folk who live in harmony with nature.
The forest to the south is... mysterious.
You sense a powerful presence nearby.
Hello! Would you like to buy something?
Oh wait, the shop is not ready yet!
I have lived in this forest for many years.
The trees whisper secrets to those who listen.
Only now, we exist together. I was tired of doing long distance so I downloaded ourselves into this virtual world where we can always be together.
Only... you came out looking strange.
Uh... we will need to fix you. But don't worry, I know just the thing. It's right through this door. Just look out for the [CHEESE]! You will still poop yourself in here...
